Table of Contents

Class LayoutValue

Namespace
osu.Framework.Layout
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

A member that represents the validation state of the layout of a Drawable. Can be invalidated according to state changes in a Drawable (via Invalidation flags), and validated on-demand when the layout has been re-computed.

public class LayoutValue : LayoutMember

invalidation Invalidation

The Invalidation flags that will invalidate this LayoutValue.

source InvalidationSource

The source of the invalidation.

conditions InvalidationConditionDelegate
